title: ‘That’s disrespectful’: Ex-Jets star scoffs at notion that Drake Maye is an MVP candidate

bullets: New England Patriots "MVP?
I think that’s disrespectful to Daniel Jones, Sam Darnold, and Matthew Stafford.

title: Roxbury Walgreens may face health department hearing after repeated violations, ISD says
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News The Columbus Avenue Walgreens has been cited for multiple health violations — including frozen foods on the ground and mice, city data shows.
A Walgreens logo is seen from the exterior of a store Nam Y.

Huh/AP By Sana Muneer November 14, 2025 | 3:31 PM 1 minute to read A Roxbury Walgreens location may appear before Boston’s health department after rodent droppings, chewed chip bags, and cockroaches were discovered by health inspectors Monday, city data shows.

title: Man dead after being struck by BMW in Georgetown
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News The driver remained at the scene, according to officials.
By Abby Patkin November 14, 2025 | 1:45 PM Less than a minute to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Red Sox pitchers Garrett Crochet, Aroldis Chapman named to All-MLB first team
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: Boston Red Sox The two left-handers headed the Red Sox bullpen in 2025 on the way to their playoff birth.
Aroldis Chapman celebrates a win over the Yankees in game 1 of the Wild Card round (Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff).
While the Red Sox‘ playoff run didn’t go as hoped, that didn’t prevent a pair of their best players from receiving a top honor.
